page.text: The warrior smirks down at you as you fall before her, then reaches down, lifting up her skirt as she steps astride your head and shoulders, squatting down she smothers your face with her rear end. gameover.text: Eaten by her ass and imprisoned in her belly your struggles do naught but please the elf who has so utterly bested you.
